Hi All,

I have lots of EJBs with Service Adapter Layers/Request Handlers.

I have to write Unit test Cases for the same.
Can anyone suggest me a good approach and also how good it is to use JUnitEE
TestRunner? 
Pls suggest the Pros and Cons.

Thanks in advance
